Reviews.Title: “Very good, will go back again”
Reviews.Author: Nana D
Reviews.Content: This was my third stay at the Martinenz Hotel in Laleli, and it was realy nice. The rooms are clean and the breakfast very delicious. The hotel is mid in the Shopping area of Istanbul and very close to the main attractions, only a food step away from the Tram station and on the main street of Laleli. I suggest this hotel to each Young traveller and will for sure go back there.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Base for Exploration of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: ORGinH
Reviews.Content: Very serviceable hotel with an accommodating and helpful staff. Rooms are simply furnished but functional and clean. Rooms have A/C, small refrigerator and TV. Free wireless is available throughout the hotel. Safe deposit boxes available. "Happy Hour" each afternoon in the lobby at 1700 features tea and biscuits. Hotel IS hard to find initially. If arriving via any method other than "Metro" as listed on the hotel website http://www.otelmartinenz.com/index.html (for example via taxi from Taksim Square) do the following: go to the Lalelei tram stop on Ordu Caddesi (Cd) (a cab driver will be able to find the tram stop, but not the hotel). Walk west (downhill) on Ordu Caddesi about 200 meters to Fethi Bey Cd/Koska Cd. On the north side of that corner is the Crowne Plaza Hotel and the Lalelei (Tulip) Mosque. Put the Crowne Plaza Hotel behind your left shoulder and the mosque behind your right shoulder and cross Ordu Cd to go south (downhill) on Koska Cd. The hotel will be about 100 meters from the intersection, on the right, up a flight of stairs (hotel marquee is high up on the entrance portal). The full breakfast on the seventh floor terrace is excellent and the view of the Sea of Marmara is fabulous.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: skhan786
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for a week, the location was great, just a tram away from all the historic places.. The rooms were cleaned every day, staff were friendly, breakfast was good enough everyday. Overall good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: nomiam
Reviews.Content: Very good location - it's near to the main attractions blubber, and Istanbul (Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar). Stuff was friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean, the towels were changed every day. Our room had air conditioning Which was needed at night as in had to keep the window closed Because of the traffic noise. The breakfast buffet was good enough

Reviews.Title: “Exellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: ettte
Reviews.Content: Exellent hotel and service - We have stayed at this hotel for 4 nights.It was wonderful. The hotel and the rooms were very clean and the towels and the sheets were changed every day. The staff helped us for everything that we need. They are so friendly and polite.They solved every problem we have for the days we stay there. The food was very good and for a good value of money. The restaurant has nice ...more [+]views. The hotel is near to a lot of places such as, Grand baazar, Haga sophia mosque, Spice Bazar, and a lot of shopping centers. I Would recommend this hotel to all.

Reviews.Title: “Execellent hotel and Attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: sebiha
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for about a week and really enjoyed our stay. The location was great as it's near the train station which takes you to the main attactions in Istanbul. The rooms where nicely cleaned every morning and comfortable. There is also a good choice of breakfast avaliable and the hotel is good value for money. Overall, the hotel staff are genuiley polite and I would highyly recommand it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “good location, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: KFilip
Reviews.Content: Hotel Martinenz is located 10 minutes walking distance from Heghia Sophia and Blue Mosque, 5 minutes to Grand Bazar. district Laleli is famous shopping district so if you are fan of shopping i strongly recommend it. It is obvious that hotel is renovated, so accommodation is ok. price of the hotel comparing to quality is great. Keep in mind that guests of hotel are mainly Russians and Ukrainians (possibly shop owners) so they can be pretty noisy (packing, unpacking .... quarreling). Breakfast is not quite good, but if you are not picky person should be ok. Service at lobby basically do not exist.... there are numerous small things which can be annoying, such as missing parts in bathroom, very small TV, not properly organized room, but i underline, for its price, it is great.

HotelInfo.Name: Otel Martinez
HotelInfo.Address: Koska Caddesi No:6 | 1 Laleli, Istanbul 34130, Turkey
